title: FS (prices reduced on remaining cards) - A trio of graded T206 SLers
author: iwantitiwinit

posts.post_title: FS (prices reduced on remaining cards) - A trio of graded T206 SLers
posts.post_content:
For Sale (prices reduced on remaining cards) - A trio of graded T206 Southern Leaguers.  Prices include postage, please message if interested and thanks for looking.  Note: NC residents add 6.75% to any agreed upon price to cover ST.

T206 Dutch Revelle P350 SLer - SGC 3  $312.50 venmo no fee or $325.00 pp gs

T206 Jimmy Hart P350 SLer - SGC 4  SOLD

T206 Ross Helm P350 SLer - SGC 4 (Super sharp card) $ 360 venmo no fee or $372.50 pp gs.
